description: Students learn conducting techniques for choral literature including research-based rehearsal techniques, vocal preparation, score study, and video self-evaluation of gesture and rehearsal. Course work also includes observation of conductors on campus and in the community. Prerequisite: Music 251. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Choral Conducting
prerequisites: Music 251. Offered annually in the fall semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 251. Offered annually in the fall semester.
